Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 23 Sanidassanasappaṭighattika » 23.1 Paṭiccavāra » 23.1.1 Paccayānuloma » 23.1.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Nissayādi
Sanidassanasappaṭighattika
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Nissayādi
15.
2971Anidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati nissayapaccayā…  upanissayapaccayā…  purejātapaccayā…  āsevanapaccayā…  kammapaccayā…  vipākapaccayā…  āhārapaccayā…  indriyapaccayā…  jhānapaccayā…  maggapaccayā…  sampayuttapaccayā…  vippayuttapaccayā…  atthipaccayā…  natthipaccayā…  vigatapaccayā…  avigatapaccayā.
<< Aññamaññaup23.1.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāra >>
